Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Reroute at Taylor/Ashland
ShortDescription: 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Ashland, Roosevelt and Racine: due to,street blockage near Taylor/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Ashland, Roosevelt and Racine: due to,street blockage near Taylor/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Polk/Paulina
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted EB: Wood, Taylor, Paulina and Harrison; WB: Harrison, Paulina, Taylor and Wood: due to, street blockage near Polk/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Polk/Paulina.

Eastbound buses will operate via Wood, Taylor, Paulina and Harrison including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Paulina, Taylor, Wood and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Reroute near Polk/Paulina
ShortDescription: 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses temp. rerouted WB: Taylor to Ogden; EB: Taylor, Ogden, Polk and Wood: due to, street blockage near Polk/Pulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Polk/Paulina.

Westbound buses will operate via Taylor to Ogden including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Eastbound buses will operate via Taylor, Ogden, Polk and Wood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound trains bypassing Grand
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Grand due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Grand due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
